::FZ/Lavacons/Perndabot/Rex/Proto/Kluster/Repressor::

FZ hears Gabriel's warning to the Maximals and shields his eyes from 
the flare. He laughs, looking back at the Cybertronian Fire and 
firing two more glowing missiles, both of them hitting the shields 
and sending an energy current through it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rex backs up carefully, watching Repressor's every move. They were 
slowly circling each other, Repressor's back now to the CF. Rex 
didn't hear the warning over the sounds of gunfire, and was blinded 
by the flash. Repressor had been standing with his back to the 
Cybertronian Fire.

Rex swears, stumbling forward, his optics scrambled. He feels two 
missiles slam into his chest, sending him falling to the ground. If 
he lived through this, the bot that threw that flash wouldn't, Rex 
thinks before slipping into unconsciousness.

Repressor laughs, watching Rex fall back. His laugh cuts off as he is 
hit in the back with an EMP shot from the CF, sending him flipping 
over Rex and falling to the ground.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Astral and Fenox were blinded by the flash. Their scanners took over 
as their optics began to readjust. THe rest of the team had covered 
their eyes.

They continue blasting at the shields, hitting them with shot after 
shot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot yells as he is blinded by the flash, stumbling back. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing his opportunity, Proto swoops down toward Perndabot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster swears again. Shots were pummeling the shields again and 
again.

"If we don't get rid of these bots soon, we're gonna be toast," he 
says to himself, watching the battle.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Gabriel and savior flew infront of the cf. They saw magnus being 
fired upon. 
> They took cover behind his armor and watched as his guns started 
fire. 
> Gabriel remembered his special tool against the crazy bot from 
before. He 
> yelled out to all the maximals. "Get behind Magnus and shield your 
eyes." As 
> he said it he pulled a flare bomb from his back and chucked it over 
the top 
> of the truck armor. He watched and pressed the remote denenator as 
it 
> cleared. It should blind all the bots infront of magnus for about 
15 seconds.
